name: Pratik Lad
summary: Senior Software Engineer with extensive experience in backend development and GenAI, specialising in designing and deploying REST APIs and WebSocket services using Node.js, Express.js, and Python.
skills: Databases orchestration, workflow automation, conversational backends.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend & GenAl, Techwarium India Pvt Ltd
experience.description: Engineered REST APIs and WebSocket services using Node.js and Python, boosting data retrieval speed by 20%. Implemented secure authentication with JWT and OAuth2 for compliant access control in multi-tenant products. Deployed containerized backend on AWS and DigitalOcean using Docker, reducing deployment time by 30%.

experience.title: Senior Unity & Backend Developer, Techwarium India Pvt Ltd
experience.description: Converted VR/AR experiences into full-stack platforms with REST APIs, databases, and backend-driven content management. Optimized runtime using lazy loading and efficient state sync, reducing lag in VR/AR apps by 20-30%.

experience.title: Contract Backend Engineer - Al & GenAl
experience.description: Designed backend services for AI receptionist featuring 3D hologram UI with integrated camera tracking and sensor data. Developed RAG-based pipelines utilizing Azure GPT for canteen menus, meeting schedules, and employee data.

experience.title: Contract Backend Engineer - Al-Driven AR Education Platform
experience.description: Developed backend services using Node.js and Python to manage object tracking events from AR clients. Integrated computer vision outputs with LLMs, enabling students to inquire about tracked objects and receive contextual responses.

experience.title: Contract Backend Engineer - GenAl Marketing Assistant (AR Product Promoter)
experience.description: Developed backend for AR-based GenAI marketing application using 3D models and conversational AI. Created APIs for product catalogues, personalization, and real-time conversation context management.

experience.title: Contract Backend Engineer - Multiplayer Game Backend (Ludosquare)
experience.description: Engineered wallet-enabled multiplayer backend utilizing WebSockets, accommodating over 4,000 concurrent players. Implemented anti-cheat systems and transaction handling to enhance security and reliability.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS), Pilani

raw_text:
PRATIK LAD
Senior Backend Engineer - Al Agents & GenAl Applications
ladpratik00@gmail.com +91-7974758609 Bengaluru linkedin.com/in/pratik-lad-04b846b5
Summary
Senior Software Engineer with extensive experience in backend development and GenAI, specialising in designing and deploying
REST APIs and WebSocket services using Node.js, Express.js, and Python. Proven track record of improving data retrieval speed by
20% and runtime by up to 40% for VR/ AR and 3D applications. Expertise in secure authentication with JWT and OAuth2,
containerised backend deployment on AWS and DigitalOcean, and optimising runtime performance through query optimisation and
caching. Notable projects include Joytree VR Shopping App, TracXpert Inventory Intelligence Platform, Lalaverse 3D Mall Platform,
Qupe 3D Dating App, and Angelium VR Metaverse. Skilled in C#, JavaScript, TypeScript, FastAPI, microservices architecture, real-
time systems development with WebSockets, MySQL schema design, cloud deployment strategies on AWS and DigitalOcean using
Docker. Career goal: to leverage expertise in API development and AI integration to drive innovation in SaaS solutions across
diverse industries.
Core Skills
Languages Backend
C#, Node.js (JavaScript/ TypeScript), Python, PHP, Ruby Express.js, FastAPI, REST APIs, WebSockets, microservices,
event-driven systems
Frontend
ReactJS (dashboards, admin panels, internal tools) GenAl & Al Agents
LLM integration (Azure GPT/ OpenAI), RAG, Al agents, prompt
Databases orchestration, workflow automation, conversational backends.
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
Cloud & DevOps
Security AWS, DigitalOcean, Docker, Linux, CI/ CD, monitoring &
JWT, OAuth2, role-based access control, secure payments logging
Domains
VR/ AR platforms, 3D apps, gaming, e-commerce, SaaS, edtech,
martech
